Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing

Class EventProcessor

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing.ProcessorBase
edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing.EventProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DocumentProcessor
public abstract class EventProcessor
extends ProcessorBase
Abstract base class for a processor of Event objects.

Example: 

     @Processor('example-processor')
     public class ExampleProcessor extends EventProcessor {
       @Override
       public void process(Event event, JsonObject params, JsonObject.Builder result) {
         // do processing on event
       }
     }

The no-argument default constructor is required for instantiation via reflection. At runtime, the process(Event, JsonObject, JsonObjectBuilder) method may be called simultaneously from multiple threads, so the implementing class is responsible for ensuring thread-safety.
